title:
We have several flights on the eastern seaboard departing and arriving from ILM. It seems that a limited number of flights to a more western destination like Las Vegas or some other major hub would be successful. 



Has anyone ever looked into a direct flight to Las Vegas? Then our film industry would only have 1 layover on the way from LA and not 2-3.... also, with people traveling to Vegas for fun on the weekends, it wouldn\'t just be used as a hub to the west, but as a weekend getaway activity for Wilmingtonians....
